column4: Hello! I'm trying to install ubuntu on my laptop, but I can't click the NEXT button on step 8 "Enter your login and password details."
And it just says "Når du er klar..." or "When you're ready..." in english :P

Hello! I'm trying to install ubuntu on my laptop, but I can't click the NEXT button on step 8 "Enter your login and password details." And it just says "Når du er klar..." or "When you're ready..." in english. Help?
